job_purpose: Enhance user content discovery and service access by leveraging AI, ML, and NLP to optimize intelligent search experiences within the Digital Experience Platform.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Lead the development and optimization of intelligent search experiences within the Digital Experience Platform.
Enhance search capabilities to ensure fast, relevant, and adaptive search experiences.
Explore personalization to elevate client engagement and drive digital experiences.
Integrate advanced search capabilities to uplift search and analytics functions.
Improve website user experience by ensuring ethical, accurate, and robust AI smart search experiences.
Optimize legacy search systems and integrate advanced/emerging search technologies.
Support the Website Strategy and Management team in a Website AI Smart Search Proof of Concept using Coveo Relevance Generative Answering.
Perform data analysis to uncover patterns, behaviors, and insights for search experience improvement.
Develop and implement AI powered learning models for the website.
Fine-tune search responses to ensure user queries are understood and relevant information is presented.
Develop processes and procedures to document system operations.
Establish a baseline of current search experiences for AI Smart Search POC assessment.
Develop measurement frameworks to evaluate and track AI performance.
Participate in knowledge and skills transfer activities.
required_qualifications: Expertise in AI Smart Search field
Ability to support Website Strategy and Management team
Experience with Coveo Relevance Generative Answering
Experience in developing AI powered learning models
company_details: Paxus values diversity and welcomes applications from Indigenous Australians, people from diverse cultural and linguistic backgrounds, and people living with a disability. They focus on providing platform and content strategy, governance, and guidance to enhance website user experiences.
